tokens.text: tracks content types and component usage across JSON files

title: Content Tags
description: Tracks content types and component usage across JSON files in the project. Used to build content indexes for cross-referencing.

fields.title: Entity Type
fields.description: Tracks entity type identifiers defined in behavior pack entity JSON files.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the entity type identifier

fields.title: Block Type
fields.description: Tracks custom block type identifiers defined in behavior pack block JSON files.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the block type identifier

fields.title: Item Type
fields.description: Tracks custom item type identifiers defined in behavior pack item JSON files.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the item type identifier

fields.title: Terrain Texture
fields.description: Tracks terrain texture short names defined in terrain_texture.json.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the terrain texture short name

fields.title: Item Texture
fields.description: Tracks item texture short names defined in item_texture.json.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the item texture short name

fields.title: Sound Definition
fields.description: Tracks sound definition identifiers defined in sound_definitions.json.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the sound definition identifier

fields.title: Music Definition
fields.description: Tracks music definition identifiers defined in music_definitions.json.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the music definition identifier

fields.title: Sound File
fields.description: Tracks individual sound file references across sound definitions.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the sound file path
